Contact FAQs

Common questions about getting in touch and scheduling service

How can I schedule a garage door service appointment?

You can schedule service by calling (201) 554-6769, booking online through our website, or texting us. We offer convenient appointment times including same-day and emergency service.

What information do I need to provide when requesting service?

Please provide your name, address, phone number, a description of the problem, and your preferred appointment time. Photos of the issue are helpful but not required.

How promptly do you respond to service requests?

We respond to all service requests within a few hours during business hours. For emergencies, we have 24/7 technicians on call and can typically arrive within 1-2 hours depending on location.

Do I need to be home for the service appointment?

Yes, someone 18 or older should be present during the appointment to provide access to the garage, approve the work, and ask any questions. We can also coordinate with property managers.

What if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?

We understand schedules change. Please call us as soon as possible to reschedule. We don't charge cancellation fees if you notify us in advance.

Can I get a quote over the phone?

We can provide rough estimates over the phone for common repairs. However, for accurate pricing, we recommend a free on-site inspection where our technician can assess the specific issue and provide upfront pricing.
